title: Fact Sheet: Plastics in the Ocean - Earth Day
body: March 5, 2022 END PLASTIC POLLUTION Fact Sheet: Plastics in the Ocean The billions upon billions of items of plastic waste choking our oceans, lakes, and rivers and piling up on land is more than unsightly and harmful to plants and wildlife. The following 10 facts shed light on how plastic is proving dangerous to our planet, health, and wildlife.
